para.text: The drains could be created in much the same way as the wells. However, this is time consuming. Instead open the file Drains.txt (in the "My Documents\examples\data\SimpleModel" folder) in a text editor, select all the text in the file and copy it to the clipboard. Then go back to ModelMuse and select
. The objects in Drains.txt define the drains required for the model.
